title: Ratatouille
description: A traditional French vegetable dish with eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes.

steps.title: Prepare vegetables
steps.description: Dice eggplants, zucchinis, and tomatoes.

steps.title: Cook
steps.description: Sauté vegetables in olive oil with garlic, then simmer.

title: Apple Pie
description: A sweet and classic dessert with a flaky crust filled with spiced apples.

steps.title: Prepare filling
steps.description: Peel and slice apples, then mix with sugar and spices.

steps.title: Make crust
steps.description: Mix flour and butter, roll into a crust.

steps.title: Assemble and bake
steps.description: Fill crust with apples, cover, and bake until golden.

title: Berries Smoothie
description: A refreshing blend of mixed berries and yogurt.

steps.title: Blend
steps.description: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.

title: Burger
description: A juicy beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

steps.title: Cook patty
steps.description: Grill the beef patty until cooked through.

steps.title: Assemble burger
steps.description: Place the patty, lettuce, tomato, and cheese in the bun.

title: Butter Chicken
description: A creamy and flavorful Indian curry with tender chicken.

steps.title: Cook chicken
steps.description: Sauté chicken in butter until golden brown.

steps.title: Prepare sauce
steps.description: Mix tomato paste, cream, and spices, then simmer.

steps.title: Combine
steps.description: Add chicken to sauce and cook for 10 minutes.

title: Crepe
description: Thin French pancakes perfect for sweet or savory fillings.

steps.title: Prepare batter
steps.description: Mix flour, milk, eggs, melted butter, and sugar.

steps.title: Cook crepes
steps.description: Pour batter into a hot pan and cook on both sides.

title: Injera
description: A traditional Ethiopian flatbread made from teff flour.

steps.title: Prepare batter
steps.description: Mix teff flour, water, and salt, then let ferment overnight.

steps.title: Cook injera
steps.description: Pour batter onto a hot pan and cook until bubbles form.

title: Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza with a crispy crust, tomato sauce, and cheese.

steps.title: Prepare base
steps.description: Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce evenly.

steps.title: Add toppings
steps.description: Top with mozzarella cheese and basil leaves.

steps.title: Bake
steps.description: Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C until golden brown.

title: Ramen
description: A comforting Japanese noodle soup with broth, pork, and vegetables.

steps.title: Prepare broth
steps.description: Simmer chicken broth with seasonings.

steps.title: Cook noodles
steps.description: Boil ramen noodles until tender.

steps.title: Assemble ramen
steps.description: Add noodles, pork belly, egg, and scallions to the broth.

title: Sangria
description: A fruity Spanish punch made with red wine and citrus fruits.

steps.title: Mix ingredients
steps.description: Combine wine, orange juice, and sugar in a pitcher.

steps.title: Add fruits
steps.description: Add lemon and orange slices to the mixture.

steps.title: Chill
steps.description: Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.

title: Shrimp Bites
description: Delicious bite-sized shrimp appetizers with garlic and herbs.

steps.title: Prepare shrimp
steps.description: Clean and devein shrimp.

steps.title: Cook
steps.description: Sauté shrimp in olive oil with garlic and parsley.
